title: Canada Extends Cruise Ban by a Year Until February 2022
content:
1. Canada Extends Cruise Ban by a Year Until February 2022  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Canada bans cruise ships for another year, likely halting most of Alaska's 2021 tourism season  Anchorage Daily News
  3. Canada bans cruise vessels until Feb. 28, 2022  KOMO News
  4. Canada's cruise ship ban extended until 2022  CBC News: The National
  5. For Sitka tourism businesses, the 2021 season is fraught with uncertainty  KCAW
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
